titleStmt.title: The second part of The nonconformists plea for peace being an account of their principles about civil and ecclesiastical authority and obedience ... : mostly written many years past, and now published to save our lives and the kingdoms peace, from the false and bloody plotters ... / by Richard Baxter.
Nonconformists plea for peace. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Although The second part of The nonconformists plea for peace was printed in 1676, it was suppressed and was first issued in 1680. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
The non-conformists plea for peace [The first part] was published in 1679.
Reproduction of original in University of Chicago Library.
